content: fast easy fun exciting - designed by juan the yarn addict materials any 4-weight yarn approximately 2000 yards for a throw sized blanket 6mm crochet hook feel free to use any yarn of your choice following the recommended hook size for the yarn chosen abbreviations/meanings chain chain double_crochet double_crochet dct double_crochet twins 2 double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet half_double_crochet skip skip space -
